name: sheetable
description: SheetAble is a self-hosted music sheet organizer for musicians. It manages PDF sheet music, supports tagging, search, and setlists, and offers a responsive web UI suitable for tablets on music stands.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Organize PDF sheet music in a searchable digital library

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize sheets by composer, genre, difficulty, or custom tags

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Build and manage setlists for performances or practice sessions

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Find sheets quickly by title, composer, tags, or content

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design perfect for music stands and tablets
